thread.title: Ericsson posts smaller first-quarter loss than expected

title: Ericsson posts smaller first-quarter loss than expected
text:
April 20, 2018 / 5:50 AM / Updated 25 minutes ago Ericsson posts smaller first-quarter loss than expected Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
STOCKHOLM (Reuters) - Mobile telecom equipment maker Ericsson ( ERICb.ST ) reported a lower-than-expected first-quarter operating loss on Friday and said it saw positive momentum in North America. FILE PHOTO: Ericsson Chief Executive Officer Borje Ekholm holds a news conference during the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona, Spain February 26, 2018. REUTERS/Yves Herman 
Sweden’s Ericsson posted an operating loss of 300 million crowns (£25.3 million), compared to a 11.3 billion loss a year earlier and a mean forecast for a 2.4 billion loss seen in a Reuters poll of analysts. Reporting by Olof Swahnberg and Helena Soderpalm; editing by Niklas Pollard
